did.unittitle: Anne and Jane Hadley - Letter from the Vice President Via Marjorie Re: "Having Something to Do Besides Scrubbing Floors" - Letter to Joe (Joseph A. McClain, Jr., General Counsel, Wabash Railroad Company) Re: Labor Disputes, 11 March 1950 - Letters to Art, Arthur Atkinson, President Wabash Railroad Company, St. Louis, MO
